Player History
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis on 4/1/1985 to a minor league deal...
Traded from St. Louis to Chicago on 7/31/1985 (Going to STL: C Jody Davis, 1B Leon Durham. Going to CHC: C Tom Pagnozzi, C Carlton Fisk, CF Brian Harper)...
Traded from Chicago to Toronto on 8/1/1988 (Going to CHC: 1B Eric Yelding. Going to TOR: C Tom Pagnozzi)...
Had first career hit on 8/27/1988, off Jim Gott (DET)...
Traded from Toronto to St. Louis on 7/28/1989 (Going to STL: P Brent Gaff, P Vince Horsman, C Tom Pagnozzi, RF Tim Salmon. Going to TOR: P Ken Dayley, P Todd Worrell)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/1/1990, off Jeff Innis (NYM)...
Injured on 8/22/1991 with a Strained Groin Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
2/2/1992: Gets a new one-year contract worth $350,000 through salary arbitration...
